faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about the AI Product Photo Generator

items.title: What types of products can I generate images for?
items.description: You can generate images for a wide range of products, from electronics to jewelry and everything in between. Our AI is designed to understand your prompts and create relevant product images.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Users receive 30 free credits every day, sufficient for generating numerous product images. For those needing more, we provide affordable subscription options.

items.title: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! Paid subscription users can use generated images for all commercial purposes. Free users can utilize images for personal needs only.

items.title: How does your privacy policy work?
items.description: Images are processed directly in your browser, ensuring complete privacy as no data is uploaded or stored remotely. Once you close the tab, all processing data is removed.

footer.heading: Ready to Generate Stunning Product Images?
